title: User Registration with Valid Data
description: Verify that a new user can successfully register using a valid email, password, username, and optional full name.

steps.description: Navigate to registration page
Enter valid email, password (min 6 chars), username, and full name
Submit registration form
Registration completes successfully and user is prompted to verify email or redirected to login

title: User Registration with Invalid Email Format
description: Verify registration fails when an invalid email format is submitted.

steps.description: Navigate to registration page
Enter invalid email, valid password, and username
Submit registration form
Error message about invalid email format is displayed and registration is blocked

title: User Login with Valid Credentials
description: Validate that a registered user can login with correct email and password.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Enter registered email and valid password
Submit login form
User is logged in successfully and directed to main feed

title: User Login with Incorrect Password
description: Verify login fails with wrong password returning an unauthorized error.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Enter valid email and incorrect password
Submit login form
Login is rejected with an unauthorized message

title: Password Reset with Registered Email
description: Verify password reset process works when requesting reset with registered email.

steps.description: Navigate to password reset page
Enter registered email and submit
Password reset email is sent and user receives the reset instructions

title: Create Post with Text Content Only
description: Validate that user can create a new post with just text content.

steps.description: Navigate to post creation modal
Enter valid text content without media or location
Submit the post
Post is successfully created and visible in the feed

title: Create Post with Multiple Media Attachments and Location
description: Verify creating a post with multiple media URLs and location metadata works correctly.

steps.description: Open post creation modal
Add text content, multiple media URLs, and set location
Submit the post
Post with media and location is displayed properly in the feed with all attachments

title: Like and Unlike a Post
description: Verify that a user can like a post and then remove the like.

steps.description: Locate a post in the feed
Click like button on the post
Like count is incremented and UI updates accordingly
Click like button again to unlike
Like is removed and UI updates accordingly

title: Add Comment with Valid Content to a Post
description: Confirm user can add a text comment to a post successfully.

steps.description: Open comments modal on a post
Enter valid comment text content
Submit comment
Comment appears under the post and is associated with correct postId

title: Fail to Add Empty Comment
description: Verify that submitting an empty comment is blocked and user is notified appropriately.

steps.description: Open comments modal on a post
Attempt to submit an empty comment
Submission is blocked and an error message about empty content is shown

title: Profile Information Retrieval
description: Check that a user profile can be fetched and displays correct full name, bio, team info, favorite equipment, and avatar.

steps.description: Request profile data for logged-in user
Profile information is returned and displayed accurately

title: Update Profile Information Successfully
description: Verify that user can update their profile fields and changes are saved and reflected.

steps.description: Navigate to profile edit screen
Change full name, bio, team info, favorite equipment, and avatar URL
Submit profile updates
Updates persist and profile screen shows new information

title: Check User XP and Rank Display
description: Ensure XP and rank information can be retrieved and displayed correctly on user profile.

steps.description: Request user XP and rank data
Returned XP and rank match test data and are displayed clearly

title: List Upcoming and Past Events
description: Verify events list can be filtered by upcoming and past events and displayed accordingly.

steps.description: Request events with filter 'upcoming'
Only upcoming events are listed with correct details
Request events with filter 'past'
Only past events are listed correctly

title: Participate and Withdraw from an Event
description: Verify a user can join an event and subsequently withdraw their participation successfully.

steps.description: Send request to participate in an event
User's participation is added and event participant count updates
Send request to withdraw from the event
User is removed from participants list and count updates

title: Messaging: List Direct and Group Conversations
description: Check that user can retrieve lists of direct messages and group chats distinctly.

steps.description: Request message conversations filtered by type 'dm'
Only direct message conversations are returned
Request message conversations filtered by type 'groups'
Only group conversations are listed

title: Admin Panel: View and Manage Reports
description: Validate admins can view reports, dismiss inappropriate reports, and delete posts with audit logging.

steps.description: Login as admin or moderator
Access admin reports listing page
List of reports is displayed correctly with relevant information
Dismiss a chosen report
Report status updates accordingly and cannot be acted on again
Delete a post reported for inappropriate content
Post is removed from feed and action is logged in audit logs

title: Role-Based Access Control Enforcement
description: Ensure that users can only access and manipulate data according to their permissions with RLS applied.

steps.description: Attempt to access another user's private profile data
Access is denied and proper error is returned
Attempt to delete a post as a non-admin user
Deletion is rejected due to lack of permissions

title: Verify TLS Encryption and Password Hashing
description: Confirm all client-server communications use HTTPS/TLS and passwords are stored hashed.

steps.description: Inspect network traffic during registration and login
All traffic is encrypted over HTTPS/TLS
Review stored password hashes and verify they are not stored in plain text
Passwords in the database are securely hashed

title: UI Theme Consistency and Accessibility on Multiple Devices
description: Verify that the red-black military style theme with high contrast is consistent and accessible across devices and screen sizes.

steps.description: Load the app on devices of different screen sizes and OS versions
Theme colors, fonts, and contrast conform to design specifications
UI elements remain usable and accessible including in dark theme mode
